name: Cosmic eye defense
description:
Kill Fleshy foes by shooting lasers with a cosmic eye. Limited by charging the laser, use a mirror to make every use of it's damage.

A game with below mediocre gameplay that suffers greatly if you read the title of the window or press a certain key. 

Feel free to post your high score in the comments ;) although this may become obsolete if a cheat key is found.

Controls:

use mouse to move the mirror+eye

lmb = shoot laser

rmb = change mirror direction

(note your mouse is locked when shooting the laser and has to charge up, try to shoot enemies sideways using the mirror)

esc = pause
